system.name: DineOut
system.description: Restaurant management system for ordering and inventory management
system.purpose: To digitalize restaurant management operations, including ordering and inventory management
system.scope: Restaurant management system for automating day-to-day tasks

stakeholders.name: Customer
stakeholders.needs: To place orders, provide feedback, and request bills

stakeholders.name: Hall Manager
stakeholders.needs: To manage tables, mark bills as paid, and receive notifications

stakeholders.name: Head Chef
stakeholders.needs: To assign orders to chefs, mark dishes as cooked, and approve cancellations

stakeholders.name: Admin
stakeholders.needs: To manage menu items, inventory, and staff members

users.description: Users who place orders and provide feedback
users.expectations: To easily place orders, provide feedback, and request bills

users.description: Users who manage tables and mark bills as paid
users.expectations: To efficiently manage tables and receive notifications

users.description: Users who assign orders to chefs and mark dishes as cooked
users.expectations: To effectively assign orders and mark dishes as cooked

users.description: Users who manage menu items, inventory, and staff members
users.expectations: To easily manage menu items, inventory, and staff members

functional_requirements.description: System displays a list of available and unavailable dishes
System allows customers to place orders
System allows head chefs to assign orders to chefs
System allows admins to manage menu items, inventory, and staff members

non_functional_requirements.description: System responds with no immediate delays
System has proper and encrypted login authentication
System provides accurate bills and orders

constraints: System must be compatible with Android version 6.0 or above
System must run on tablets with enough resources
assumptions: System will always be used on tablets with enough resources
Firebase database will always be available

interfaces.description: Customer interface for placing orders and providing feedback
Connection to bill printer and credit card reader
